TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_wall
inventory=[{"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 54, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 53, "index": 21}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 21, "index": 30}, {"type": "nether_sprouts", "quantity": 29, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft an end_stone_brick_wall, I need to place 6 end_stone_bricks in a 3x2 formation in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving 1 end_stone_brick from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
